title: ‘I Think Vingegaard Is Afraid of Me’: Pogačar, Evenepoel Unhappy with Visma Tour de France Tactics
content:
GC contenders critical of Jonas Vingegaard’s refusal to pull when clear in gravel stage breakaways.

Read the full article at ‘I Think Vingegaard Is Afraid of Me’: Pogačar, Evenepoel Unhappy with Visma Tour de France Tactics on Velo.
author: sstokes
